system.description: The character can use their expertise to make precise aimed shots with weapons not normally designed for such accuracy.
system.benefit: When Firing a Single Shot from a Pistol, Heavy, or Vehicle Weapon with the Accurate Quality whilst Benefiting from the Aim Action, character treats weapon as if it were a Basic Weapon (AKA, +1d10 Damage per Two Degrees of Success, up to 2d10, can't generate Righteous Fury)

specialAbilities.name: Accurate Non-Basic Weapons
specialAbilities.description: When aiming with Accurate pistols, heavy, or vehicle weapons, treat as Basic weapon (+1d10 damage per 2 DoS, up to +2d10, no Righteous Fury).
